articles.title: Doctor Who casts Sex Education’s Ncuti Gatwa as 14th Doctor - Polygon
articles.description: After nearly 60 years, the new Doctor in Doctor Who will be a Black man. Sex Education’s Ncuti Gatwa will take on the role for the 2023 season, just as the first female Doctor Who, Jodie Whittaker, steps down from the role.
